events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and want to request a refund because the product I got isn't what I paid for.
The issue described by the customer matches refund criteria due to wrong item received and request for money back.
Assigning this refund case to support agent Laura for further handling as she specializes in order issues.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. I'm here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 789456123 and attached is the photo of the item I got which clearly is different from what was advertised.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund and send you a prepaid return label to send back the incorrect item.
That sounds good, I appreciate the quick response and easy solution to get my money back.
The refund process is now complete, and the prepaid return label has been emailed to you. Please let us know if you need anything else.
Just checking in to confirm you received the prepaid label and to ensure your refund has been processed to your satisfaction.
We are closing this case now as the refund has been successfully processed and the customer confirmed receipt of the return label.
A short survey has been sent to gather feedback about your recent refund experience and overall customer service.
